strapiPost.title: Crystal Bridges and Amazeum Seek Public Feedback for Project
strapiPost.content:
Crystal Bridges and the Amazeum are requesting public feedback during the design phase of Convergence, an outdoor play space designed to be inclusive of individuals of all ages and abilities. -5 News

  • Inspired by arts, science and nature, Convergence will be a 4-acre public outdoor play space nestled between Crystal Bridges and the Amazeum in Bentonville.
  • A survey was created to learn how individuals in the community think they will use the space and to hear any concerns they may have. To provide anonymous feedback, fill out the survey HERE.
